import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Addlist from './components/Addlist'; export default function App() { const courses=[ {id: "MarcheF",nom:"Marche femmes",categorie:"F", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarcheH",nom:"Marche hommes",categorie:"H", distance:10000 }, {id: "MarathonF",nom:"Marathon fommes",categorie:"F", distance:42000 }, {id: "MarathonH",nom:"Marathon hommes",categorie:"H", distance:42000 } ] const participants=[ {id: "1", nom:"Med", idCourse: "MarcheH"}, {id: "2",nom:"Rajae", idCourse: "MarcheF"} ] const[index,setIndex]=useState(0) const[affich,setAffich]=useState('') setAffich(courses[index].id) return (
Commetition d'athletisme {affich}
Course ID
Course Name
Distance
Cathegorie Homme Fammme
Participants
ID participantsnt nom ID course Action
) }
